resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete %d NPCs?
Remember to save your changes with Save NPC!
If you like our work and want to support us, feel free to donate!

RPG NPC Generator is a free application for those who want to create NPCs without much struggle, adding the Random factor to the formula. This application is able to generate 1.6 * 10^21 DIFFERENT npcs. That's a very big number: 

 1600000000000000000000

 Besides free, this application is 100% open source, and can be seen in github:
 https://github.com/Kerooker/rpg-npc-generator

Leonardo "Kerooker" Lopes is a Brazilian Student at the University of SÃ£o Paulo. With a passion for TableTop RPGs and a constant need of learning, Leonardo started developing this application as a hobby, and it came to a conclusion.

 Contact Information: 
 Email: leonardo.colman.lopes@usp.br
